description: The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB) is Canada's largest independent administrative tribunal. It is responsible for making well-reasoned decisions on immigration and refugee matters, efficiently, fairly and in accordance with the law. The IRB decides, among other responsibilities, who needs refugee protection among the thousands of claimants who come to Canada annually. Every year, the Board renders thousands of decisions on refugee protection and immigration matters. At these hearings, refugees and immigrants who are not fluent in English or French count on the IRB to provide them with interpretive services.

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Tender Title
Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada - Interpreter Program

### Reference Number
cb-600-32917191

### Tender Status
Open

### Overview
The Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB) is seeking contract interpreters to provide language interpretation services for refugee and immigration proceedings. The Interpreter Program is designed to ensure that individuals with limited English or French proficiency have access to quality interpretation services in a wide range of languages and dialects.

### Description
The IRB is seeking contract interpreters to provide services on an "as-and-when-requested" basis. Contractors will be paid a flat hourly rate and will be selected based on their language proficiency, experience, and cultural knowledge. Interpreters will be required to work on an on-call basis, with potential assignments given with short notice.

### Selection Criteria
Selection for contract award will be based on the following criteria:

*   Language proficiency in official languages (English and French) and target language or dialect
*   Previous interpretation experience, whether for the IRB or another organization
*   Fluency in speaking and reading in the required official and target language or dialect
*   Familiarity with cultural and customs of regions in which languages or dialects are spoken
*   Information provided by referrals submitted by applicants

### Contact Information
For more information, please visit the IRB website or submit your application through the designated channels:

*   Eastern Region (Quebec and Atlantic Provinces): [https://irb-cisr.gc.ca/en/interpreters/Pages/SouSolMtl.aspx](https://irb-cisr.gc.ca/en/interpreters/Pages/SouSolMtl.aspx)
*   Central Region (Ontario): [https://irb-cisr.gc.ca/en/interpreters/Pages/SouSolTor.aspx](https://irb-cisr.gc.ca/en/interpreters/Pages/SouSolTor.aspx)
*   Western Region (British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba): [https://irb-cisr.gc.ca/en/interpreters/Pages/SouSolVan.aspx](https://irb-cisr.gc.ca/en/interpreters/Pages/SouSolVan.aspx) назна
